metadata.description:
Not at Comic-Con? No problem. Get the special Comic-Con International 2015 comiXology variant cover by Gabriel Rodriguez for a limited time only. Offer ends Monday, July 13th at 11pm EST.

From deepest space comes the cyborg warrior Onyx... but has she come to Earth in its time of dire need to save it or to end it? A star-born knight for a new generation takes flight here!
metadata.name: Onyx
